outcome: A popular puzzle app, played by thousands daily, starts producing cryptic solutions that, when arranged, spell 'I wasn’t alone.' Citizens widely speculate external tampering, sparking mass paranoia, grassroots investigations, and leading the Council to pursue suspected foreign meddling.

events.description: Thousands of users notice the city’s top puzzle app forming unexplainable patterns. Social networks erupt as screenshots reveal clues spelling the phrase 'I wasn’t alone.'
Grassroots groups and influencers analyze clues, tracing them back to anomalies in BCI behavior post-Halden. Rumors of external system hacking surge.
The Council formally blames suspected foreign actors for the puzzle app anomaly, launching citywide digital purges and sweeping BCI data lockdowns.
Mass protests and neighborhood watch groups surge after suspicion falls on outside manipulation. The city divides over loyalty, turning BCI compliance into a litmus test for patriotism.
